channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A new Miss Universe is crowned, weeks after she left a pageant event in protest
item.description: This year's Miss Universe competition, held in Bangkok, was marred by a series of dramatic incidents, from a contestant's livestreamed walkout to a no...

item.title: South Africa hosts G20 as tensions with U.S. flare amid boycott
item.description: The U.S. boycotts South Africa's G20 summit, sparking a diplomatic spat and throwing the global gathering into turmoil.

item.title: Can vaping help wean people off cigarettes? Anti-smoking advocates are sharply split
item.description: Many think it's a dangerous ploy by the tobacco industry. But some say, with millions of deaths each year attributed to smoking cigarettes, it's the l...

item.title: The female crash test dummy has been a long time coming — but she isn't here yet
item.description: After years of limbo, the U.S. government has given the green light to a crash test dummy based on the female body. But will it be used right away? No...

item.title: Putin says U.S. plan for Ukraine could form the basis for a final peace settlement
item.description: The plan includes many of Russian President Vladimir Putin's demands. Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said Friday that his country is at "trul...

item.title: The Empty Rooms | Sunday on 60 Minutes
item.description: For seven years, CBS News correspondent Steve Hartman and photographer Lou Bopp have documented the virtually untouched bedrooms of children killed in...

item.title: Mamdani set to meet with President Trump at White House today
item.description: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani is set to meet with President Trump on Friday afternoon, where he plans to discuss affordability​.

item.title: Former Venezuela ambassador on why the U.S. is building up military in Caribbean
item.description: House Democrats have introduced a bill that calls for funding to be cut off for American operations against Venezuela. Former top diplomat to Venezuel...

item.title: Pupils abducted from Catholic school in fresh Nigeria attack
item.description: Residents fear that close to 100 students and staff may have been taken during the early-morning raid.

item.title: A Chicago street vendor couple has a defiant response to immigration arrests: Stick to the routine
Here's what experts say is behind bitcoin's $800 billion drop
item.description: Bitcoin has erased all of its 2025 gains and is on track for its worst monthly performance since 2022. Here's what experts say about the decline.

item.title: 'A lot of fighting': Fossil fuel row breaks out at UN climate summit
item.description: A row over fossil fuels has broken out at COP30 but this is also likely to be a negotiating tactic.

item.title: US judge resigns after being disciplined for wearing Elvis wig in court
item.description: In court, Judge Thornhill would play the singer's music from his phone and make "irrelevant" references to him.

item.title: What we know about leaked US draft plan to end Russia's Ukraine war
item.description: There are 28 key points and while several on the face of it could be acceptable to Ukraine, others cross Kyiv's red lines.

item.title: Grizzly bear on loose after attacking school group in Canada, injuring 11
item.description: A male teacher "got the whole brunt" of the attack and some children were hit with bear spray.

item.title: Officer acquitted in death of Ta’Kiya Young, a pregnant Black mother accused of shoplifting
item.description: An Ohio officer has been acquitted of all charges after fatally shooting Ta’Kiya Young in a supermarket parking lot.

item.title: Watch Live: Trump and Mamdani speak after first meeting at the White House
item.description: President Trump and incoming New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani are speaking in the Oval Office after their first meeting. Follow live updates here.

item.title: Torrential rains return to Southern California, prompting new flash flood fears, threat of mudslides
